name: Samurai Dash (Mitchell Todd)
description:
SAMURAI DASH

How long can you survive? Do you have what it takes to be a Samurai master? Run through the meadows and dodge as many ninja stars as you can, if you get hit you will perish and your mission will come to a halt. Only a true Samurai can thrive in these dangerous meadows! This game is still currently in development and I plan on adding more features to this game in the future. This was a simple game to develop and was pretty straight forward. Follow me for future games and check out my collection. Feel free to drop a comment and rating on how the game was. I hope you enjoy my game. Good luck Samurai!

INSTRUCTIONS

[W] [A] / [Up] [Down] - Samurai Dash 

CREDITS

Checkout these artist, without them this game would not look professional.

Background Image: Ios App Game Background
Samurai Asset: Martial Hero - luizmelo
Ninja Star: Shuriken Pixel Art - Loel

Font: Engebrechtre
Other Sounds: Sound Pack

UPDATE NOTES

v2.0 - In Development

Developed in Godot 3.3

MacOSx DOWNLOAD Section

IF THIS ERROR HAPPENS WHEN LOADING.

1) Allow your Mac to run the game by opening terminal and typing command: 

xattr -cr Users/(user name)/Downloads/Samurai \Dash.app/

"(user name)" - Typically your name.
"Downloads" - Directory/Folder the game is inside.
"Samurai \Dash.app" - The game executable .app file.

IF THIS ERROR CONTINUES...

2) Override security and privacy settings by running terminal command: 

sudo spctl --master-disable

3) Then navigate to:

System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Allow apps downloaded from:

4) Enable the button labeled:

"Anywhere". SCREENSHOTS FROM THE GAME
